channel.title: Cannot Connect To Any Gaming Servers?
channel.description:
Just as the topic says, i am unable to connect to any server for weeks. I tried games like rumble fighter, Silkroad, Conquer Online, stick arena ballistic. all these games i tried, i cannot connect to any of them. my firewall is on, but even when i turn it off, it still wont work. i've tried port forwarding and all those others like cmd where i typed in netsh ip sumthing sumtin but none work. i am using a dsl and the modem number is westell 6100. my computer is toshiba satellite with intel, 4bg 800MHz SDRAM and 250GB HDD. any help please? the only game that i am currently able to play is runescape and dragonfable. also some games on mofunzone which does not have multiplayer.
i think this problem starts happening when i uninstalled norton antivirus, but i'm not sure since i can still play these games at my friend's house by using his wireless network.

item.title: Cannot Connect To Any Gaming Servers?
item.dc:creator: @skill_pk1 skill_pk
item.description:
@skill_pk1 wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:2, topic:273118”]Sorry I misread your topic.

uninstalling Norton oviously stopped Nortons firewall and Windows firewall as probably been affected[/quote]

nvm i fixed the problem, i didn’t notice that the firewall on the router was a problem. but thanks for your help!

Read full topic
item.source: Cannot Connect To Any Gaming Servers?

item.title: Cannot Connect To Any Gaming Servers?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Sorry I misread your topic.

Uninstalling Norton oviously stopped Nortons firewall and Windows firewall was probably messed up during the Installation of Norton.

Read full topic
